Package com.buralotech.oss.jcrunit

Class JCRRepositoryExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buralotech.oss.jcrunit.JCRRepositoryExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterTestExecutionCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeTestExecutionCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.Extension, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolver
    public class JCRRepositoryExtension
extends Object
implements org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeTestExecutionCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterTestExecutionCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolver
    JUnit 5 (Jupiter) extension that will start an embedded JCR repository before the test method execution and stop the embedded JCR repository when the test method completes.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static String HELPER
      The name of the property used to cache the reference to the JCR repository helper.

      The name of the property used to cache the reference to the JCR repository.

      • beforeTestExecution

        public void beforeTestExecution​(org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext context)

      • afterTestExecution

      • supportsParameter

        public boolean supportsParameter​(org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterContext parameterContext,
                                 org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext extensionContext)
                          throws org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolutionException
        Check the parameter type is JCRRepositoryTester or Repository.
        Specified by:
        supportsParameter in interface org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolver
        Parameters:
        parameterContext - The context for the parameter for which an argument should be resolved; never null.
        extensionContext - The extension context for the Executable about to be invoked; never null.
        Returns:
        true if the parameter type is JCRRepositoryTester or Repository. Otherwise, false.
        Throws:
        org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolutionException

      • resolveParameter

        public Object resolveParameter​(org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterContext parameterContext,
                               org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext extensionContext)
                        throws org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolutionException
        Resolve JCRRepositoryTester parameters.
        Specified by:
        resolveParameter in interface org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolver
        Parameters:
        parameterContext - The context for the parameter for which an argument should be resolved; never null.
        extensionContext - –The extension context for the Executable about to be invoked; never null.
        Returns:
        The resolved parameter.
        Throws:
        org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolutionException - If a conneciton to the directory server could not be established.

      • getStore

        private org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext.Store getStore​(org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext extensionContext)
        Get teh context storage for the method invocation.
        Parameters:
        extensionContext - – the extension context for the Executable about to be invoked; never null.
        Returns:
        The context store.

      • getAnnotation

        private JCRRepositoryConfiguration getAnnotation​(org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext extensionContext)
        Locate the annotation that specifies the configuration for the content repository. The annotation is sought on the test method declaration before falling back to check the test class.
        Parameters:
        extensionContext - – the extension context for the Executable about to be invoked; never null.
        Returns:
        The JCRRepositoryConfiguration annotation if found. Otherwise, null.
